name: Bandolero - Firecracker Exclusive Edition - LE
additionalNotes: United's Firecracker line has been around for many years, and is released to commemorate the 4th of July, and a few other holidays in between. This release is close to United's heart, collaborating with Bandolero a company by Nelson Alfonso, or Selected Tobacco, whom United distributes. This Firecracker is bold, and flavorful. All tobacco has been aged for 5 years, and then aged 2 years post-roll.
